body: There is what happened before this. The killer is his/her friend but he dies.

Ahhhhhhhh!!!!! What happens next!? Does she die and is turned into a vampire to revive her or she's just saved and stays as a human?????!!!

Actually I also don't speak japanese but for what I understood in the description he put says that there's a hope of continuation. Not confirmed yet, unfortunately. Also I don't know if she became a vampire or not, but I think she was a human man that became just a human woman with some kind of stimulus that induces lactation. If she died or not I think this's the point that the autor wanted to leave open.
Ssomeone,  i don't speak japanese but did she become a vampire? and does that last scene mean that she dies?
